column1: 09.07.2010 and dismissed the Writ Application. The Petition of the said Writ Application
is marked as P12A. In the said Petition, the Petitioner has pleaded the vacation of post letter
marked as P2 and further has pleaded that they have canvassed the validity of the said letter
before the Public Service Commission and the Administrative Appeals Tribunal and has
sought to quash the Administrative Appeals Tribunal order. But the Court of Appeal after
hearing both parties had made its decision and dismissed the  Writ  Application. It is the
contention of the Respondents that in this background the Petitionerâ€™s contention to quash
the letter sending him on vacation of post amounts to recanvassing the same ground yet
again in the Court of Appeal.
